name: root
description: A monorepo for all npm packages in the Tasit ecosystem

scripts.ganache:start: npm run ganache:stop && npx lerna run ganache:start --scope tasit-contracts
scripts.truffle:migrate: npx lerna run compile --scope tasit-contracts && npx lerna run migrate  --scope tasit-contracts
